oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stories From the Split
Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Woordrow, Ross
Laughren, Pat
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A collection including a video and corresponding transcripts from Stories from the Split, a comprehensive analytical written and audiovisual history of the clash of ideologies, individuals, organisations and events which culminated in "the Split" in the Australian Labor Party in the 1950s.
